name: Immortal Mutant Pursuit
description:
Italo is born with the ability to mutate. One summer day, there was a Ninja invasion. Italo's lab got robbed.

To stay mortal and get his stolen pills back, for each level, he must kill the majority of Ninjas, search their pockets, and find the key token to unlock the jar machine. He runs out of energy quickly by jumping, and dies after too many moves.

Be careful for spikes, bombs, yellow spinning saws, and red-hot torches!

Collect enough mutant coins, and pick a different mutated look for your player Italo by tapping SHOP in the Main Menu.

Italo can grow limbs, claws, horns and even multiple eyes!

For slow motion, simply tap and hold the touch screen on your phone/tablet, or left-click on your computer screen and hold down the mouse button.

Features:

- BRAIN CHALLENGE yourself by swiping in REVERSE direction for certain mutants!
- Tablet-optimized UI
- Single screen-tapping
- Addictive
- 60 levels from easy to challenging
- More levels to come
- Some creative levels

Have a tablet? Awesome. Play Immortal Mutant Pursuit with large buttons and explore the game with a GUI-rich experience! Get immersed with the larger high-quality graphics and view, with even easier single finger-taps!
